subject: Re: [junit] What is the solution to test web services?

messageBody:
Jirong Hu wrote:
>
>
> Hi
>
> I have used JUnit to test J2EE applications, but never got a chance
> to code web services.
>
> How do you test web services, both for unit test and integration
> test?

I would write two kinds of tests:

1. Test the logic of the web service by simply instantiating the code
that implements the service in a plain JVM and invoking it in tests.

2. Test the interface of the web service, connecting over HTTP using a
tool like XHTMLUnit or HTTPUnit or jWebUnit.

The tests in #2 don't need to verify all the same things as the tests in
#1. The tests in #2 focus on whether the web service correctly responds
to both valid and invalid requests.
